name: Ext_R2_ReferralRequest_description
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.ReferralRequest.description for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ReferralRequest.description from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ReferralRequest|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: A textual description of the referral
element.definition: The reason element gives a short description of why the referral is being made, the description expands on this to support a more complete clinical summary.
element.comment: Mapping of FHIR R3:ReferralRequest element `ReferralRequest.description` to R4:ServiceRequest element ``
